step_data.thought:
I am now on the Shipments page within the Sales section, as confirmed by the URL in the RootWebArea: 'http://127.0.0.1:7780/admin/sales/shipment/'. 

Let me review what I've accomplished so far based on the user's goal:
1. I navigated to the Sales section
2. I accessed the Orders page
3. I accessed the Invoices page
4. I am now on the Shipments page

I have successfully navigated to all three sections of the Sales module that the user wanted to manage: orders, invoices, and shipments. The current page shows a list of shipments with details like shipment ID, ship date, order number, ship-to name, and total quantity.

Since I have successfully completed the user's goal of navigating to the Sales section to manage orders, invoices, and shipments, I should now inform the user that their request has been fulfilled.
step_data.action: stop('I have successfully navigated through the Sales section. You now have access to manage shipments. Previously, I also navigated to the orders and invoices sections. You can manage all three aspects of sales (orders, invoices, and shipments) by clicking on the SALES menu item and selecting the appropriate option from the dropdown menu.')
